titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ATTENDANCE CATEGORY CODE - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: First Accident and Emergency Attendance - the first in a series, or the only attendance, in a particular Accident and Emergency Episode
Follow-up Accident and Emergency Attendance - planned: a subsequent planned attendance at the same department, and for the same incident as the first attendance
Follow-up Accident and Emergency Attendance - unplanned: a subsequent unplanned attendance at the same department, and for the same incident as the first attendance
